title: Belle & Sebastian's influence on indie rock and pop since the '90s is undeniable
description: The music industry is known for hype and drama and flash-in-the-pan stars who are up-and-coming one day and gone the next. But Belle & Sebastian are an exception.
itunes:title: Belle & Sebastian's influence on indie rock and pop since the '90s is undeniable
itunes:author: Raina Douris
